title: Petz - Cute Mobs
name: petz
short_description: Adorable creatures with advanced AI behaviors for Luanti
long_description:
Add a complete ecosystem of cute animals with sophisticated mob AI to your Luanti world! Features 20+ different animals including cats, dogs, farm animals, and wildlife. Each creature has realistic behaviors, feeding mechanics, taming systems, and interactive breeding. Powered by the advanced Kitz mob engine for smooth animations and intelligent AI behaviors. Fully compatible with Luanti 5.14 and modern APIs.

**Animals Included**: Pets (dogs, cats, hamsters), Farm Animals (chickens, pigs, sheep, goats, cows, horses), Wildlife (foxes, wolves, pandas, bunnies, squirrels, bats), Aquatic (tropical fish, clownfish, turtles, beavers, frogs), Insects (butterflies, moths, ants, geckos), and Special seasonal creatures.

**Features**: Advanced AI behaviors, taming and feeding systems, breeding mechanics, Tamagochi-style pet care, extensive configuration options, multiplayer server support, and full Luanti 5.14 compatibility.

**Installation**: This modpack includes kitz (mob engine), petz (main animals), and bale (farming integration). Simply install via ContentDB or download and place in your mods folder.
